name: Jumble (itch)
description:
WASD or Arrows to move. Don't bump into things!

Press "J" to hide the joystick if you're on desktop. Sorry it's so big.

V1.1: Added touch controls. Hopefully.

V1.2: Removing device detection as itch.io seemingly can't detect that.

V1.3: Adding option to hide joystick because it's honking massive.

V1.4: Added back in the EventSystem which I mistakenly deleted, showing me just how far I have to go before I understand how any of this works.
